mapper.select: SELECT DOC_NO , DOC_TYPE , DOC_TITLE , ENAME , TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') INSERT_DATE , DECODE(SGN_STATUS, 0, '임시저장', 1, '결재중') AS SGN_STATUS_STR FROM SGN_DOC SD,EMP WHERE SD.WRITER_NO = EMP.EMPNO AND SGN_STATUS IN (0, 1) ORDER BY INSERT_DATE

SELECT DOC_NO , DOC_TYPE , DOC_TITLE , ENAME , TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') INSERT_DATE , DECODE(SGN_STATUS, 2, '결재완료', 3, '반려') AS SGN_STATUS_STR FROM SGN_DOC SD,EMP WHERE SD.WRITER_NO = EMP.EMPNO AND SGN_STATUS IN (2, 3) ORDER BY INSERT_DATE

SELECT ENAME , DENAME , EMPNO , D.DEPTNO , (SELECT ENAME FROM EMP WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = D.DEPTNO AND E_JOB = '부장') AS APPROVER_NAME , (SELECT EMPNO FROM EMP WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = D.DEPTNO AND E_JOB = '부장') AS APPROVER_NO , (SELECT E_JOB FROM EMP WHERE EMP.DEPTNO = D.DEPTNO AND E_JOB = '부장') AS APPROVER_JOB FROM EMP E, DEPT D WHERE E.DEPTNO = D.DEPTNO AND EMPNO = ${empno}
SELECT EMPNO , ENAME , E_JOB , LEVEL FROM EMP WHERE ENAME LIKE '%'||#{ename}||'%' START WITH MGR IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR EMPNO = MGR

SELECT DOC.DOC_NO , WRITER_NO , DOC_TITLE , TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INSERT_DATE , DAL_NO , DAL_TYPE , TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') START_DATE , TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END_DATE , START_TIME , END_TIME , LEAVE_DAYS , LEAVE_REASON , ENAME , DENAME , APPROVER_NO , (SELECT ENAME FROM EMP WHERE EMPNO = SGN.APPROVER_NO) APPROVER_NAME , (SELECT E_JOB FROM EMP WHERE EMPNO = SGN.APPROVER_NO) APPROVER_JOB , SGN_ORDER , DECODE(SGN_RESULT, '0', '미결재', '1', '결재') SGN_RESULT_STR , SGN_COMENT , TO_CHAR(SGN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')SGN_DATE FROM SGN_DOC DOC, DOC_ANNUAL_LEAVE DAL, SGN, EMP, DEPT WHERE DOC.DOC_NO = DAL.DOC_NO AND SGN.DOC_NO = DOC.DOC_NO AND DOC.WRITER_NO = EMP.EMPNO AND EMP.DEPTNO = DEPT.DEPTNO AND DOC.DOC_NO = ${docNo}
SELECT ITEM_NO , ITEM_NAME , ITEM_PRICE FROM ITEM ORDER BY ITEM_NO
